overview:
Prior to forming Invus in 1985, Ray was a manager for The Boston Consulting Group in Paris. He holds an MBA from Stanford Graduate School of Business, an MS in Food Science and Technology from the University of California, Davis and a BS in Agricultural Sciences and Agricultural Engineering from the American University of Beirut. He is currently the President of Action Against Hunger â€” USA and a Trustee of Connecticut College.

Current public company directorships: Weight Watchers International (NYSE: WTW), Lexicon Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:LXRX). Past public company directorship: Keebler (NYSE: KBL)
